remarks: Lemma for ~ zringlpir .  A nonzero ideal of integers contains some positive integers.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)
statement:
zringlpirlem.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. ( LIdeal ` ZZring ) ) $.
zringlpirlem.n0 $e |- ( ph -> I =/= { 0 } ) $.
zringlpirlem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( I i^i NN ) =/= (/) ) $.
